FUBAR. Rewatch. First watched in 2005. I laughed at the Ryan brothers' last gathering, then I felt so sad. Spielberg mentions the Holocaust in many of his movies. That year's Oscars...sigh, when it comes to Harvey Weinstein, what can you say. Memorial Day 2014.
